questions.question: When did Lothair Ii's mother die?
questions.oracle_context:

Wikipedia Title: Ermengarde of Tours
Ermengarde of Tours (d. 20 March 851) was the daughter of Hugh of Tours, a member of the Etichonen family.

model_full_responses.gpt-4o:
Lothair II's mother is Ermengarde of Tours. According to the information provided, Ermengarde of Tours died on 20 March 851. 

Answer: 20 March 851.

questions.question: Which film has the director who is older, God'S Gift To Women or Aldri Annet Enn Bråk?
questions.oracle_context:
Wikipedia Title: God's Gift to Women
God's Gift to Women is a 1931 American pre-Code romantic musical comedy film directed by Michael Curtiz, starring Frank Fay, Laura LaPlante, and Joan Blondell.
Wikipedia Title: Aldri annet enn bråk
Aldri annet enn bråk is a 1954 Norwegian comedy- drama film, edited by Edith Carlmar.
Wikipedia Title: Michael Curtiz
Mihály Kertész (1905); December 24, 1886 April 11, 1962) was a Hungarian-born American film director, recognized as one of the most prolific directors in history.
Wikipedia Title: Edith Carlmar
Edith Carlmar (Edith Mary Johanne Mathiesen) (15 November 1911 – 17 May 2003) was an Norwagian actress and Norway's first female film director.

model_full_responses.gpt-4o:
To determine which film has the director who is older, we need to compare the birth dates of the directors of the two films.

- "God's Gift to Women" is directed by Michael Curtiz. According to the information, Michael Curtiz was born on December 24, 1886.
- "Aldri annet enn bråk" is directed by Edith Carlmar. Edith Carlmar was born on November 15, 1911.

Comparing the birth dates, Michael Curtiz (born in 1886) is older than Edith Carlmar (born in 1911).

Answer: God's Gift to Women.
model_full_responses.gpt-4o-mini:

1. "God's Gift to Women" is directed by Michael Curtiz, who was born on December 24, 1886.
2. "Aldri annet enn bråk" is edited by Edith Carlmar, who was born on November 15, 1911.

Now, comparing their birth years:
- Michael Curtiz (1886) is older than Edith Carlmar (1911).

Since Michael Curtiz directed "God's Gift to Women," and he is older than Edith Carlmar, who is associated with "Aldri annet enn bråk," it follows that "God's Gift to Women" has the older director.

Answer: God's Gift to Women.
